analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#40)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.buy (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#800-832):
	External calls:
	- amount = getPurchaseReturn(_connectorToken,_depositAmount) (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#805-806)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- connectors (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#809-814)

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.convert (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#779-792):
	External calls:
	- purchaseAmount = buy(_fromToken,_amount,1) (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#791-792)
	- sell(_toToken,purchaseAmount,_minReturn) (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#792)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- connectors (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#792)

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.sell (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#837-876):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_sellAmount <= token.balanceOf(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#842-844)
	- amount = getSaleReturn(_connectorToken,_sellAmount) (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#844-845)
	- tokenSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#847-848)
	- connectorBalance = getConnectorBalance(_connectorToken) (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#848-850)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- connectors (/unique_chucks/37/0x72faf56b84760c866030bafa6856656bfc41a364.sol#855-856)
